plot: A man goes to Shanghai to find his father, only to witness him being shot. He sets out to bring his father's killer to justice.
title: Jipyeongseoneun mali eobta
plot_es: A man goes to Shanghai to find his father, only to witness him being shot. He sets out to bring his father's killer to justice.
plot_en: A man goes to Shanghai to find his father, only to witness him being shot. He sets out to bring his father's killer to justice.
